General.Name: Kingstate Electronics
General.Description: Kingstate Electronics Corp. manufactures and sells acoustic products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers various products, including piezo buzzers, magnetic buzzers, micro speakers, dynamic receivers, Bluetooth speakers, and electret condenser microphones; and audio products, such as earphones, wired and wireless headphones, Bluetooth headphones, sports headphones, gaming headphones, TWS products, wireless speakers, and PSAP products; speaker module/mic module products; and personal sound amplifiers, etc. The company also provides OEM/ODM smart devices, including personal safety and wireless alarms, VoIP systems, anti-lost devices, smart doorbells, and IP speakers. The company offers its products for use in telecommunications, consumer electronics, information technology, home appliances, automotive, security, medical, and industrial equipment related industries. Kingstate Electronics Corp. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 69-11, JhongJheng East Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 25170
